message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'm taking most of the money, but you get a chance to get more in the next round.
You took a big risk by lowballing me. Now it's my turn to set the pace.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give you a larger share than my first offer, but we both need to compromise to reach a deal before the value of the money drops further.
I'm starting to get impatient. You're not taking me seriously. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a good deal.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm starting to worry about the value of the money dropping further. Let's make a deal before it's too late.
